title: kazhanigaL shUzh
sahitya:
kazhanigaL shUzh tirup-pazhani malai nAthA mazhalai mozhi vaLLi magizhu malarp-pAdA


anupallavi

  mazha viDaaiyariyOn maindanE guhanE kazhalinaip-pOTrinEn kAttiDa vENDum


caraNam    kuzhandaiyin uLLamum kuTramill shenkaiyum pazham tamizh pOTrum nin pada malar bhaktiyum 
Kalaiyamu-dinbamum kavitaiyin UTRamum malai maghaL udaviya vaLLalE aruLuvAi
